document_data.mainbody:
Alatos "Ravenscar" Thuibuld was the leader of a thieves guild in Baldurs Gate during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Ravenscar directed the thieves of the Baldurian guild to aggressively ruin or otherwise suppress any would-be rivals that emerged in the citys underground.
In the , Alatos schemed with the Halruaan mage Resar to steal a number of material components used in the construction of Halruaan skyships from the estate of Oberan within the city.
